mapper.select: SELECT VAC_GRNT_NO, user_id, VAC_TP, FN_GET_MNG_CD_NM(VAC_TP) AS VAC_TP_NM, vac_grnt_days, VAC_GRNT_YMD, SUM(vac_grnt_days) OVER (PARTITION BY user_id) AS TOTAL_VAC_GRNT_DAYS, VLD_YMD, VAC_GRNT_EXPLN FROM vac_grnt WHERE USER_ID=#{userId} ORDER BY VAC_GRNT_YMD DESC

SELECT A.user_id, NVL(SUM(A.vac_grnt_days),0) AS TOTAL_VAC_GRNT_DAYS, (SELECT NVL(SUM(B.CNY_DAY),0) AS TOTAL_CNY_DAY FROM VAC_USE B WHERE TO_CHAR(B.BGNG_DT, 'YYYY') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY') AND B.user_id = A.user_id GROUP BY B.user_id) AS USED_DAYS FROM vac_grnt A WHERE TO_CHAR(A.VAC_GRNT_YMD, 'YYYY') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY') AND A.USER_ID = #{userId} GROUP BY A.user_id

SELECT A.user_id ,A.co_id ,A.user_pswd ,A.user_nm ,A.user_telno ,A.user_eml ,A.brth_ymd ,A.user_zip ,A.user_addr ,A.user_daddr ,A.user_img ,A.sign_img ,A.gndr_mf ,A.hobby ,A.spcabl ,A.USER_IMG ,A.SIGN_IMG ,A.msngr_stts ,FN_GET_MNG_CD_NM(A.MSNGR_STTS) AS MSNGR_STTS ,A.enabled ,A.mngr_yn ,B.dept_no ,B.jbgd_cd , FN_GET_CST_CD_NM(B.jbgd_cd) AS jbgd_cd_nm ,B.jbtl_cd , FN_GET_CST_CD_NM(B.jbtl_cd) AS jbtl_cd_nm ,B.anslry ,B.bank_nm ,B.act_no ,B.jncmp_ymd ,B.rsgntn_ymd ,B.hdof_cd ,FN_GET_MNG_CD_NM(B.hdof_cd) AS hdof_cd_nm ,B.mtrsc_cd ,FN_GET_MNG_CD_NM(B.mtrsc_cd) AS mtrsc_cd_nm ,C.co_nm ,D.hr_rcrd_no ,D.DEPT_NO ,FN_GET_DEPT_NO_NM(D.DEPT_NO,A.co_id) as DEPT_NO_record ,D.jbgd_cd , FN_GET_CST_CD_NM(D.jbgd_cd) AS jbgd_cd_nm_record ,D.jbtl_cd , FN_GET_CST_CD_NM(D.jbtl_cd) AS jbtl_cd_nm_record ,D.bgng_ymd ,D.end_ymd ,D.hr_rcrd_expln ,E.fam_no ,E.fam_nm ,E.fam_rel_cd ,FN_GET_MNG_CD_NM(E.fam_rel_cd) AS fam_rel_cd_nm ,E.brth_ymd AS brth_ymd_fam ,E.gndr_mf AS gndr_mf_fam ,F.DEPT_NM ,G.CRTFCT_NO ,G.CR_ACQS_NO ,G.CRTFCT_ISSU_NO ,G.CRTFCT_ACQS_YMD ,FN_GET_CRTFCT_CD_NM(G.CRTFCT_NO) AS CRTFCT_NO_NM ,G.CRTFCT_SCR
FROM users A INNER JOIN emp_info B ON A.user_id = B.user_id
INNER JOIN CO_INFO C ON A.co_id = C.co_id
LEFT JOIN hr_rcrd D ON A.user_id = D.user_id
LEFT JOIN fam E ON A.user_id = E.user_id
INNER JOIN dept F ON B.dept_no = F.dept_no
LEFT jOIN CRTFCT_ACQS G ON A.user_id = G.user_id
WHERE A.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert:
SELECT NVL(MAX(FAM_NO),0)+1 FROM FAM
INSERT INTO FAM(FAM_NO, USER_ID, FAM_NM, FAM_REL_CD, BRTH_YMD, GNDR_MF) VALUES(#{famNo},#{userId},#{famNm},#{famRelCd},#{brthYmdFam},#{gndrMfFam})
mapper.select: SELECT MNG_CD, GR_CD, MNG_CD_NM1, USE_YN FROM MANAGE_CODE WHERE GR_CD = 'FM' AND USE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT user_id ,cny_day ,vac_tp ,FN_GET_MNG_CD_NM(vac_tp) as vac_tp_nm ,bgng_dt ,end_dt ,VAC_RSN
FROM vac_use
WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND TO_CHAR(bgng_dt, 'YYYY') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY')
ORDER BY bgng_dt

SELECT A.user_id ,A.cny_day ,A.vac_tp ,FN_GET_MNG_CD_NM(A.vac_tp) AS vac_tp_nm ,A.bgng_dt ,A.end_dt ,A.VAC_RSN ,TO_CHAR(B.JNCMP_YMD,'YYYY') AS JOIN_YEAR
FROM vac_use A INNER JOIN EMP_INFO B ON B.user_id = A.user_id WHERE A.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY A.bgng_dt

SELECT A.user_id ,A.cny_day ,A.vac_tp ,FN_GET_MNG_CD_NM(A.vac_tp) AS vac_tp_nm ,A.bgng_dt ,A.end_dt ,A.VAC_RSN ,TO_CHAR(B.JNCMP_YMD,'YYYY') AS JOIN_YEAR
FROM vac_use A INNER JOIN EMP_INFO B ON B.user_id = A.user_id WHERE A.user_id = #{userId} AND TO_CHAR(A.bgng_dt, 'YYYY') = #{selectedValue}

SELECT A.user_id, A.user_nm, A.CO_ID, FN_GET_DEPT_NO_NM(B.DEPT_NO, A.CO_ID) AS DEPT_NO_NM, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') - TO_CHAR(B.JNCMP_YMD, 'YYYY') + 1 AS WORKING_YEAR, FN_GET_MNG_CD_NM(B.HDOF_CD) AS HDOF_CD_NM, NVL(c.TOTAL_VAC_GRNT_DAYS, 0) AS TOTAL_VAC_GRNT_DAYS, NVL(d.TOTAL_CNY_DAY, 0) AS TOTAL_CNY_DAY, NVL(c.TOTAL_VAC_GRNT_DAYS, 0) - NVL(d.TOTAL_CNY_DAY, 0) AS REMAIN_DAYS FROM users A INNER JOIN EMP_INFO B ON B.USER_ID = A.USER_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT USER_ID, NVL(SUM(vac_grnt_days), 0) AS TOTAL_VAC_GRNT_DAYS FROM vac_grnt WHERE TO_CHAR(vac_grnt_ymd, 'YYYY') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY') GROUP BY USER_ID ) c ON c.USER_ID = A.USER_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT USER_ID, NVL(SUM(cny_day), 0) AS TOTAL_CNY_DAY FROM VAC_USE WHERE TO_CHAR(bgng_dt, 'YYYY') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY') GROUP BY USER_ID ) d ON d.USER_ID = A.USER_ID WHERE A.CO_ID = #{coId}

SELECT payment_no, user_id, co_id, work_ym, pay_ymd, ROUND(salary,0), COALESCE(extn_salary, 0) AS extn_salary, cgffd, npn, emplyminsrnc, incmtax, llx, ROUND(pymntamt,0) AS pymntamt, nhis, ltc, TRUNC(COALESCE(salary, 0) + COALESCE(extn_salary, 0) + COALESCE(cgffd, 0), -2) AS totalPayment, npn + emplyminsrnc + incmtax + llx + nhis + ltc AS totalTex, SUBSTR(work_ym, 1, 4) AS selectYear
FROM payment A
WHERE co_id = #{coId} AND user_id = #{userId} AND SUBSTR(work_ym, 1, 4) = #{selectYear} ORDER BY work_ym

SELECT A.payment_no, A.user_id, B.USER_NM, A.co_id, FN_GET_DEPT_NO_NM(C.DEPT_NO, A.CO_ID) AS DEPT_NO_NM, FN_GET_CST_CD_NM(c.jbgd_cd) AS jbgd_cd_nm, B.BRTH_YMD, A.work_ym, A.pay_ymd, A.salary, ROUND(A.salary,0) AS round_salary, COALESCE(A.extn_salary, 0) AS extn_salary, A.cgffd, A.npn, A.emplyminsrnc, A.incmtax, A.llx, ROUND(A.pymntamt,0) AS pymntamt, A.nhis, A.ltc, TRUNC(COALESCE(salary, 0) + COALESCE(extn_salary, 0) + COALESCE(cgffd, 0), -2) AS totalPayment, A.npn + A.emplyminsrnc + A.incmtax + A.llx + A.nhis + A.ltc AS totalTex
FROM payment A
INNER JOIN USERS B on B.user_id = A.user_id
INNER JOIN EMP_INFO C on C.USER_ID = A.USER_ID
WHERE payment_no = #{paymentNo}
SELECT A.USER_ID ,B.USER_NM ,A.BANK_NM ,A.ACT_NO FROM EMP_INFO A INNER JOIN USERS B ON B.USER_ID = A.USER_ID WHERE A.USER_ID= #{userId}

SELECT A.payment_no, A.user_id, B.USER_NM, A.co_id, FN_GET_DEPT_NO_NM(C.DEPT_NO, A.CO_ID) AS DEPT_NO_NM, C.BANK_NM, C.ACT_NO, ROUND(A.pymntamt,0) AS pymntamt, TRUNC(COALESCE(A.salary, 0) + COALESCE(A.extn_salary, 0) + COALESCE(A.cgffd, 0), -2) AS totalPayment, nvl(A.npn + A.emplyminsrnc + A.incmtax + A.llx + A.nhis + A.ltc,0) AS totalTex, SUBSTR(A.work_ym, 1, 4) AS selectYear, SUBSTR(A.work_ym, 5, 6) AS selectMonth
FROM payment A
INNER JOIN USERS B ON A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID
INNER JOIN EMP_INFO C ON C.USER_ID = A.USER_ID
WHERE A.co_id = #{coId} ORDER BY A.work_ym desc

SELECT A.payment_no, A.user_id, B.USER_NM, A.co_id, FN_GET_DEPT_NO_NM(C.DEPT_NO, A.CO_ID) AS DEPT_NO_NM, FN_GET_CST_CD_NM(c.jbgd_cd) AS jbgd_cd_nm, c.BANK_NM, c.ACT_NO, A.work_ym, A.pay_ymd, ROUND(A.salary,0) AS round_salary, COALESCE(A.extn_salary, 0) AS extn_salary, A.cgffd, A.npn, A.emplyminsrnc, A.incmtax, A.llx, A.nhis, A.ltc, TRUNC(COALESCE(salary, 0) + COALESCE(extn_salary, 0) + COALESCE(cgffd, 0), -2) AS totalPayment, A.npn + A.emplyminsrnc + A.incmtax + A.llx + A.nhis + A.ltc AS totalTex, ROUND(A.pymntamt,0) AS pymntamt
FROM payment A
INNER JOIN USERS B on B.user_id = A.user_id
INNER JOIN EMP_INFO C on C.USER_ID = A.USER_ID
WHERE A.CO_ID = #{coId}
order by pay_ymd desc,user_id asc, DEPT_NO_NM desc
